title: Justice!

meta.alt_txt: secretly retaliate against each attacker for {!e card_get_meta_num {fusion} ju_amt} damage
meta.double_alt_txt: secretly retaliate against each attacker for {!e card_get_meta_num {fusion} ju_amt} damage. In addition, you will learn both attackers' names
meta.triple_alt_txt: publicly retaliate against each attacker for {!e card_get_meta_num {fusion} ju_amt} damage

desc:
[ju]

Block 1 attack and secretly retaliate against the attacker for 1 damage.
